programme.title: Emma Barnett Meets...

programme.title: Emma Barnett Meets...
programme.desc: Elif Shafak. Emma Barnett meets the British-Turkish writer Elif Shafak. They discuss violence against women under Erdogan, being investigated for writing fiction, and sexual identity in 2022.

programme.desc: Azzi Fudd is starting her sophomore year for the University of Connecticut Huskies, following in the footsteps of basketball's best while trailblazing a new path to profit.

programme.desc: One of the most feared players in the NFL, the soft-spoken Ndamukong Suh has amassed an impressive real estate portfolio and hopes to use property to close the wealth gap for people of colour.
